reference.shortdesc: The hasNarrower element specifies that the contained subjects have a narrower focus than the container subject.

section.title: Usage information
section.p: The container subject is more general than the subjects contained within the hasNarrowerelement. The way in which the contained subjects represent a narrower relationship is not specified.

section.title: Specialization hierarchy
section.p: The hasNarrower element is specialized from topicref. It is defined in the subject scheme module.
